```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(echarts)
library(dplyr)
```

## Simple topology

[example](http://echarts.baidu.com/echarts2/doc/example/force1.html#-en)

```{r}
set.seed(19882505)
grps <- LETTERS[1:4]

nodes <- data.frame(name = LETTERS[1:20],
                    value = round(runif(20, 5, 25)),
                    grps = sample(grps, 20, replace = T))

edges <- data.frame(from = sample(LETTERS[1:20], 30, replace = TRUE),
                    to = sample(LETTERS[1:20], 30, replace = TRUE))

showLabel <- list(normal = list(label = list(show = TRUE)))

echart() %>% 
  eforce(itemStyle = showLabel) %>% 
  enodes(nodes, name = name, label = name, value = value, category = grps) %>% 
  elinks(edges, from, to)
```

## Tree

[example](http://echarts.baidu.com/echarts2/doc/example/force2.html#-en)

```{r}
nodes <- data.frame(name = c("ego", "layer1 - 1", "layer1 - 2", "layer2 - 1", "layer2 - 2", "layer2 - 3", "layer2 - 4"),
                    values = round(runif(7, 5, 10)),
                    depth = c(0, 1, 1, 2, 2, 2, 2))

edges <- data.frame(from = c("ego", "ego", "layer1 - 1", "layer1 - 2", "layer1 - 1", "layer1 - 2"),
                 to = c("layer1 - 1", "layer1 - 2", "layer2 - 1", "layer2 - 2", "layer2 - 3", "layer2 - 4"))

echart() %>% 
  eforce() %>% 
  enodes(nodes, name = name, label = name, value = values, category = depth, depth = depth) %>% 
  elinks(edges, from, to)
```
